name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the API key was created

name: expires_at
description: Optional expiration timestamp for the API key

name: is_active
description: Whether the API key is active

name: description
description: Optional description of the API key purpose

name: scopes
description: List of permission scopes for the API key

name: last_used_at
description: Timestamp of the last API key usage

name: created_by
description: User or service that created the API key
